anns.exact: Since 2017, the Antibiotic Resistant Target Seeker (ARTS) facilitated TDGM approaches in order to prioritize promising strains producing antibiotics with putative novel modes of action by rapidly linking housekeeping and known resistance genes to BGC proximity, duplication and horizontal gene transfer (HGT) events (20,21).
